00034 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.BuddyList {
00035     public class Accounts : IAccounts, IDisposable {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PUBLIC Const
00038         // ============================================
00039         public const string dbName = "users.db";
00040 
00041         // ============================================
00042         // PRIVATE Members
00043         // ============================================
00044         private SQLite sqlite = null;
00045 
00046         // ============================================
00047         // PUBLIC Constructors
00048         // ============================================
00050         public Accounts() {
00051             // SQLite File Path
00052             string dbPath = Path.Combine(Utils.Paths.ConfigDirectory, dbName);
00053 
00054             // Connect To SQLite DB and Open Connection
00055             this.sqlite = new SQLite(dbPath);
00056             this.sqlite.Open();
00057 
00058             if (this.sqlite.TableExists("accounts") == false) {
00059                 CreateAccountsTable();
00060             }
00061         }
00062 
00063         // ============================================
00064         // PUBLIC Methods
00065         // ============================================
00067         public void Dispose() {
00068             this.sqlite.Dispose();
00069             this.sqlite = null;
00070         }
00071 
00073         public string[] GetAllAccounts() {
00074             string sql = "SELECT username FROM `accounts`;";
00075             return(sqlite.ExecuteReadStrings(sql));
00076         }
00077 
00079         public string GetUserPassword (string username) {
00080             string sql = "SELECT password FROM `accounts` WHERE username=@Name;";
00081             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00082             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00083             return(sqlite.ExecuteReadString(sql, sqlParams));
00084         }
00085 
00087         public string GetUserName (int id) {
00088             string sql = "SELECT username FROM `accounts` WHERE id=@Id;";
00089             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00090             sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00091             return(sqlite.ExecuteReadString(sql, sqlParams));
00092         }
00093 
00095         public int GetUserId (string username) {
00096             string sql = "SELECT id FROM `accounts` WHERE username=@Name;";
00097             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00098             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00099             return(sqlite.ExecuteReadInt(sql, sqlParams));
00100         }
00101 
00103         public int Insert (string username, string password) {
00104             string sql = "INSERT INTO `accounts` (username, password) VALUES (@Name, @Password);";
00105             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00106             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00107             sqlParams.Add("@Password", password);
00108             return(sqlite.ExecuteNonQueryGetID(sql, sqlParams));
00109         }
00110 
00111         public void Remove (string username) {
00112             string sql = "DELETE from accounts WHERE username=@Name;";
00113             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00114             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00115             sqlite.ExecuteNonQuery(sql, sqlParams);
00116         }

00122         // +----------+------------------+
00123         // | id       | INTEGER          |

00125         // | username | VARCHAR(32 + 24) |
00126         // +----------+------------------+
00127         // | password | VARCHAR(32)      |
00128         // +----------+------------------+
00129         private void CreateAccountsTable() {
00130             string sql = "CREATE TABLE accounts (" +
00131                             "id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL," +
00132                             "username VARCHAR(56) NOT NULL UNIQUE," +
00133                             "password VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL" +
00134                          ");";
00135             sqlite.ExecuteNonQuery(sql);
00136         }
